base_description: Brown, square, box-like object with removable lid.
part_description: Consists of a square base and a flat square lid. The base has a hollow interior and the lid fits snugly on top. The parts are uniformly brown.
internal_interaction_description: The lid fits securely onto the top of the base, covering the hollow interior. The snug fit ensures that the contents are protected and do not spill. The flat design of the lid allows for easy stacking or placement of additional objects on top.
external_interaction_description: The object can be used to store small items, keeping them organized and protected. Its flat top allows for stacking with similar objects. It is portable and can be easily moved or carried, interacting well with other storage solutions.
